Samba Em Preludio
Baden Powel - Vinicius de Moraes  

Bm Bm9 Bm Em7 Em7/6 Em Em7/-5 Bbdim  

Bm7      Bm7/+5  Bm7 F#7      F#7/-9 F# Am6       B7/+5  Em9
Ba ba baba       ba  ba ba ba ba     ba ba  ba  ba ba ba ba  ba  baba

    G6        F#7/+5 Bm7     D/A    G#dim           G6         F#7/+5
Ba  baba  ba  ba  baba   ba  baba baba ba  baba    baba ba  ba ba

Bm7      Bm7/+5 Bm7 F#7    F#7/-9 F7 Am6       B7/+5  Em9
ba ba  baba     ba  ba bababa     ba baba  ba  ba  ba baba  ba  ba

    G6       F#7/+5  Bm7      D/A       Dm7/-5   G7          C#m7/-5 F#7/+5 Bm7  Em7/-5 Bbdim
bababa   ba  ba  ba  baba ba  ba  ba  baba  ba  baba  ba ba  ba      ba-    ba

Bm7 D/A    G6 F#7       Am6             B7/+5      Em9
ba  ba  ba-   ba ba  ba-baba ba ba  bababa   baba  baba

G6 F#7/+5 Bm7 D/A     G#dim                            Dbm7/-5             F#7/+5
ba-ba  ba-ba- ba ba   ba-ba  ba-baba  ba  ba   ba ba   ba-ba  ba-baba  ba  ba

Bm7   D/A   G6 F#7          Am6                B7/+5        Em9
  ba  ba  baba-ba  baba  ba baba  ba-baba  ba baba  baba ba ba

G6  F#7/+5 Bm7 D/A      Dm7/-5   G7          C#m7/-5 F#7/+5 Bm7  D/A
ba  ba  ba ba- ba ba  baba  ba  baba  ba ba  ba      ba     ba

      Dm7/-5   G7          C#m7/-5 F#7/+5 Bm7  Bm7/9
ba  baba  ba  baba  ba ba  ba      ba-    ba
